WELCOME_MESSAGE:
Welcome! This bot helps people fleeing the war to find a job in the Netherlands. We collect relevant vacancies in HORECA and make it accessible for those in need. 

 What would you like to do?
JOB_SEARCH_ASK_NAME: We know it could be challenging to find a job in a foreign country! No worries, we are here to help you. We will ask you 5 simple questions to send you most relevant vacancies. First, what's your name?
JOB_SEARCH_ASK_POSTCODE:
Thank you! 

To show you relevant vacancies in your area we need to know your city of residence. We will use this information only for internal processes and will never share it with anyone else.

What is your postcode in the Netherlands? Make sure to enter it in correct format: '1234 AB'
JOB_SEARCH_ASK_LANGUAGE:
Thank you. 

Do you speak English on intermediate or higher level?
JOB_SEARCH_ASK_CATEGORIES: Good. Which jobs are you interested in?
JOB_SEARCH_SUMMARY: We have saved the following info about you:
JOB_SEARCH_END:
We'll inform you though this bot once we receive any relevant jobs in your city. Please, do not delete this bot. 

Good luck!
WRONG_POSTCODE: We cannot find the index you entered. It is supposed to be of format '1234 AB'. Please, try again. What is your postcode in the Netherlands?
ADDRESS_SUMMARY: 🏠 You live in {city}, is this correct?
SUBMIT_PHOTO_MESSAGE_1: Thousands of people who fled the war are in need of job. We collect vacancies that could be relevant for them. You can help us to fill up this database.
SUBMIT_PHOTO_MESSAGE_2: Most of refugees are not speaking Dutch and/ or possess special skills, so we focus on jobs like hostess, delivery man, waiters, and general workers.
SUBMIT_PHOTO_MESSAGE_3:
Did you spot a job poster for such a vacancy onstreet? You can upload a photo of the poster and we will pick it up from there. 

Or did you find about a vacancy online? Simply share a link with us!
SUBMIT_PHOTO: Please upload a photo of job poster. Make sure to upload it in decent quality and not to crop important details out!
PARSE_PHOTO_INTRO: Thank you for helping us to clean some job descriptions that were uploaded by other volunteers. Here is the full text we received from someone:
PARSE_PHOTO_ASK_JOB_TITLE: What's the correct job title? Please type it in English using 3 words max.
PARSE_PHOTO_ASK_JOB_CITY:
Thank you! 

Which city this job is located?
PARSE_PHOTO_ASK_JOB_COMPANY:
Thanks. 

What is the name of the company?
PARSE_PHOTO_ASK_JOB_CATEGORY: Which category this vacancy falls in?
PARSE_PHOTO_THANKS:
Thank you for your help! 

 Now we will share this opportunity with refugees who are looking for job in that city. Do you want to help us with one more vacancy text?
SUBSCRIBE: Thank you! We have added you to our send out list. You will receive relevant vacancies in your city.
MESSAGE_TEMPLATE: Hi, today we found {0} job(s) for you. {1}
